title: Who is Cristiano Ronaldo's real wife?

og.title: Who is Cristiano Ronaldo's real wife?
og.description: Answer (1 of 47): No, He is not married. You might get confused by his 3 children but 3 of them are from surrogate mothers which is legal way to make kids in Portugal. And his girlfriend Georgina Rodríguez is now pregnant so, Ronaldo is about to be father of his fourth children soon.
